biography_text: HARDER, Josh, a Representative from California; born in Turlock, Stanislaus County, Calif., August 1, 1986; graduated from Modesto Public High School, Modesto, Calif.; B.A., Stanford University, Stanford, Calif.; M.B.A., Harvard University, Cambridge, Mass.; M.P.P., Harvard University, Cambridge, Mass.; entrepreneur; consultant; professor; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress (January 3, 2019-present).
